text: Tirani (Aymara tira cradle, -ni a suffix, "the one with a cradle", also spelled Tirane) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru. It is situated in the Arequipa Region, Condesuyos Province, on the border of the districts of Cayarani and Salamanca.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Condesuyos Province (Arequipa Region) == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Tirani
